Small Business Invoice & Payment Tracker

- Single-page web app in one HTML file with inline CSS and JavaScript, no external libraries.
- Purpose: Help small business owners create, manage, and track invoices and payments quickly.
- Features:
  - Create new invoices with client name, items (description, quantity, unit price), and automatic total calculation.
  - Mark invoices as paid/unpaid and record payment date.
  - Display invoices in a sortable, filterable list by status (paid/unpaid/all) and date.
  - Edit and delete existing invoices.
  - Show summary dashboard: total outstanding amount, total received, and invoice count.
  - Share invoice data via URL hash encoding for easy backup or sharing (data serialization in URL).
- User experience:
  - Responsive layout with clear sections for invoice creation, list, and summary.
  - Keyboard-first navigation: tab order logical, form inputs focusable, shortcuts for adding invoice and toggling filters.
  - Automatic dark/light theme based on user OS preference, with manual toggle.
- Persistence:
  - Save all data locally in browser localStorage for persistence across sessions.
- Accessibility:
  - Use semantic HTML form controls, ARIA labels where needed.
  - Ensure color contrast meets accessibility standards in both themes.
- Performance:
  - Minimal assets, fast load and interaction with no page reloads.
- UI:
  - Clean and minimalist design prioritizing clarity and ease of use.
